title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Kialara Silver Series, 2017 'To The Moon' 100,000 bits #170 / 250LOT 2: Kialara Silver Series, 2021 'Exogenesis' 2,000,000 sats #154 / 250 *Each bar comes in the plastic protective cases that were made by Kialara*(Can click each title to get more information about the bars  )LOT 1LOT 2STARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0190BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0470BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 23rd, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bidPAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
